# Italian Brainrot Clicker
# Italian Brainrot Clicker is a hilarious meme-themed idle clicker game. Players click to unlock wild AI-generated scenes, meme upgrades, and endless surprises.

Designed for meme lovers and casual gamers, the site features responsive design, regular updates, and supports multiple languages for a global audience.

## 核心内容
[首页](https://italianbrainrotclicker.com/): The homepage introduces the main game features, how to play, pro tips, player reviews, latest updates, and frequently asked questions.
